title: How do I set my phone to work as a modem and provide Internet access for computers?
answer:
1. On the home screen, touch Settings. 

 1. Go to Wireless & networks, and touch Tethering & portable hotspot. 

 1. Touch USB tethering. 

 1. On a computer, use HiSuite to install the USB driver for your phone. Right-click My Computer and choose Manage. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111077)

 When using USB tethering, your phone's mobile data connection must be turned on. Otherwise, the phone cannot provide Internet access for computers. 

 [If the computer provides a wireless network adapter, you can turn on Portable Wi-Fi hotspot under Settings > More > Wireless & networks > Tethering & portable hotspot on your phone. Then the computer can connect to your phone over Wi-Fi to access the Internet. Currently, this function is available to computers running Windows.]()
